data.text: @ManTh1ng @UConnNursing @CorsIAQ @JimRosenthal4 @kprather88 @DavidElfstrom A few shrouds were not perfectly centered, I agree. We had quality control address and modify as needed.

@ashleyhunsucker @MarinaC_Dyb @UConnNursing @CorsIAQ @JimRosenthal4 @kprather88 Ashley, the inventor of this idea says to use a new fan bc the plug is fused for extra safety. Sorry about that. Guess I'll have to disassemble my A frame one lol It's with an old fan.

@MarinaC_Dyb @UConnNursing @CorsIAQ @JimRosenthal4 @kprather88 1st-awesome!
2nd-seeing this photo I've come 2 realize that people might not understand the shroud.  It is not only the circumference that matters, but also the placement. @DavidElfstrom perhaps this could be clarified further somehow? "We are trying 2 evenly cover the corners"? https://t.co/RcLgUlmJGT

@ChiVolunteerEMS @MarinaC_Dyb It's called a shroud and is there to make the air blow through more efficiently, like the shroud on a car's radiator fan. It prevents the recirculation of air around the fan at the outer edges.

@ashleyhunsucker @MarinaC_Dyb @UConnNursing @CorsIAQ @JimRosenthal4 @kprather88 also, I worked at lowe's plumbing for ten yrs so I can describe things pretty well for ppl to follow at home instructions so if u get stuck message me. This goes for anyone trying to make one of these. Almost done with my A frame corsiRosenthall box lol Good luck w/ it! https://t.co/QrpkuflQLC

@ashleyhunsucker @MarinaC_Dyb @UConnNursing @CorsIAQ @JimRosenthal4 @kprather88 Also, I paid extra for one day shipping, filters didn't get here in one day so they reversed the extra shipping I paid for one day. If you have prime tho, it's free shipping. Walmart plus is also a subscription monthly fee like Prime amazon and both offer free ship. but old fan

@ashleyhunsucker @MarinaC_Dyb @UConnNursing @CorsIAQ @JimRosenthal4 @kprather88 showing on the fan are the fan blades circle. You are taping over the blank corners, so to speak, so air isn't going IN on those corners, is why. Don't leave any gaps, tape it. If in doubt, tape it, tape it, tape it.
